item.title: BE
item.description: score:0 Chances: One analyst thinks that powering data centers will help this fuel cell company charge higher. Investors are hunting for the cheapest hydrogen stocks to buy due to the demand for better environmental tech and solutions. Risks: The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.
